reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate summing major vasculitides: Giant cell arteritis (~10), Takayasu arteritis (~2), Polyarteritis nodosa (~2), Microscopic polyangiitis (~3), Granulomatosis with polyangiitis (~5), Eosinophilic granulomatosis (~2), Henoch-Schönlein purpura (~10), Behçet's (~3), other (~3) = ~40 per 100k.
